Desc.entry: Provides music tuition, rehearsal and performance space for people who may not be able to ordinarily access music. A voluntary organisation that meets according to performance and tuition needs. Aims to provide music tuition and entertainment, which helps to uplift the human spirit, build confidence and encourage individuals to empower themselves and their communities. Tries to create suitable environments for users, be they simply hobbyists or those wishing to perform for audiences. Gives people opportunities to test their performance skills by attending local venues and festivals.
